page.title: 02MICHELMERSH BRICKWORKS
page.content: The employees of{Michelmersh {Brickworks}have no particular ranks but they all do their own jobs such as working the machines, making bricks by hand, collecting the bricks ready to put into the drier and loading and unloading the kilns. In addition there is an overall manager. The{ {Brickworks}have been running since l840 and the clay at the back is expected to last another 50 years. The workers start at 7:30am and finish at 5:00pm. The {Brickworks} cover at least 30_40 acres. There are two main machines; one takes the clay and mixes it with sand and coaldust, the other machine actually makes the bricks. Most of the bricks, however, are made by hand. The{Brickworks} employ between 80 and 90 people.
